item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Hypnosis & Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group. [b]This month’s topic:

Topic:Open Discussion

This is a time to bring any questions, comments, ideas about Hypnosis and/or NLP.  There is typically several other experience hypnotists or NLP practitioners at the meeting so I expect a vibrant and valuable meeting.

We will probably facilitate a couple of demos and group hypnosis, if time allows.

 

This should be fun!

 

Kevin Martin, CHT, MpNLP

Hypnotist Positive Effects Methuen, MA (978) 494-4542

kenda_assoc@msn.com

www.poseffects.com

---------------------------------- Helping people to help themselves------------------------

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Hypnosis and NLP Meetup - Lexington-Open Discussion on Hypnosis/NLP
